name: Maria, Gesù e il Verbo
description: Modified and glitched version of the Regina Angelorum, oil by Bouguereau (1900), exhibited at the Petit Palais (Paris). I’m in love with this painting, but annoyed with the subject, so I decided to add an AK-47 on the hand Jesus. So everything went in its place! The unglitched version was the side A of a card printed in 100 hand numbered copies and used in 2013 for a funny droplifting operation among Italy and Bosnia. In this version I added some false databending (direct image editing).
